guide.introduction_rendered:
This is a test project. This will give you an overview of how to create your own Balinese Shadow Puppet.

Relevant parts
  • Balsa wood sticks
Tools
  • Ballpoint pen
  • Hammer
  • Lighter
  • Marker
  • Nylon string
  • Paint
  • Paintbrush
  • Paraffin wax
  • Rawhide
  • Rawhide chisels
  • Sandpaper
  • Sharp knife
  • Wood block

lines.text: Draw your design on a sheet of rawhide, accounting for the negative space that will be visible when this puppet is used to caste a shadow.
lines.text_raw: Draw your design on a sheet of rawhide, accounting for the negative space that will be visible when this puppet is used to caste a shadow.

lines.text: To learn more about designing for shadows, see [en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wayang|<wbr />this site]
lines.text_raw: To learn more about designing for shadows, see [en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wayang|this site]

lines.text: Any moving pieces -- such as limbs, gears, etc. -- should be designed as separate pieces.
lines.text_raw: Any moving pieces -- such as limbs, gears, etc. -- should be designed as separate pieces.

lines.text: Cut out each piece of rawhide in a rough way so you can work on each piece individually.
lines.text_raw: Cut out each piece of rawhide in a rough way so you can work on each piece individually.

lines.text: Do not try to cut the exact outline with your knife. This outline will be cut to the right shape with a chisel.
lines.text_raw: Do not try to cut the exact outline with your knife. This outline will be cut to the right shape with a chisel.

lines.text: Set up your rawhide so you can use a chisel to cut out the design. Place the rawhide on a block of wood (what kind of wood?) and pin in place.
lines.text_raw: Set up your rawhide so you can use a chisel to cut out the design. Place the rawhide on a block of wood (what kind of wood?) and pin in place.

lines.text: Careful not to pin your rawhide in a place that leave a hole in your puppet as this will cast a shadow.
lines.text_raw: Careful not to pin your rawhide in a place that leave a hole in your puppet as this will cast a shadow.

lines.text: Using a hammer, chisels and a paraffin wax, start to chisel out your designs.
lines.text_raw: Using a hammer, chisels and a paraffin wax, start to chisel out your designs.

lines.text: Details on how to chisel traditional designs can be found [here].
lines.text_raw: Details on how to chisel traditional designs can be found [here].
